definitions.text: produced without vibration of the vocal cords
examples: unvoiced consonants such as `p' and `k' and `s'

definitions.text: deprived of the rights of citizenship especially the right to vote
examples: disenfrenchised masses took to the streets
could hardly hear her breathed plea, `Help me'

definitions.text: being without sound through injury or illness and thus incapable of all but whispered speech
